backgroundInformationList.description: NOTICE OF BY-LAW 925-2021 TO AMEND BY-LAW 238-2020 - 90 Croatia Street (980 Dufferin Street)

noticeDescription:
IN THE MATTER OF THE ONTARIO HERITAGE ACT

R.S.O. 1990 CHAPTER 0.18 AND

CITY OF TORONTO, PROVINCE OF ONTARIO

90 CROATIA STREET (980 DUFFERIN STREET)

 

NOTICE OF BY-LAW 925-2021 TO AMEND BY-LAW 238-2020

Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 925-2021 to amend By-law 238-2020, being a by-law designate the property at 90 Croatia Street (980 Dufferin Street) (Ward 9 Davenport) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.
subheading: IN THE MATTER OF THE ONTARIO HERITAGE ACT R.S.O. 1990 CHAPTER 0.18 AND CITY OF TORONTO, PROVINCE OF ONTARIO 90 CROATIA STREET (980 DUFFERIN STREET)
title: NOTICE OF BY-LAW 925-2021 TO AMEND BY-LAW 238-2020 - 90 CROATIA STREET (980 DUFFERIN STREET)
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
